snippet: After Elena Romanova’s quest to find a cure for her daughter’s brain tumor took her and her children away from Russia, the 34-year-old is starting over in New York....
abstract: UJA-Federation of New York, one of eight organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Russian immigrant Elena Romanova of Brooklyn and her two children with funds to pay household bills.
lead_paragraph: After Elena Romanova’s quest to find a cure for her daughter’s brain tumor took her and her children away from Russia, the 34-year-old is starting over in New York.

headline.print_headline: A Mother Searched the World for a Cure, but Must Start Over
headline.main: After Searching the World for a Cure, a Mother Seeks Normalcy

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
